archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.unittitle: Virginia Public School Register - Blacksburg School no. 14, 1896-1900
did.abstract: The Virginia Public School Register contains the names, ages, and attendance records of students attending Blacksburg White School No. 14. Entries date from October 1896 through March 1900.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Virginia Public School Register - Blacksburg School no.14 must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: The Virginia Public School Register - Blacksburg School no.14, Ms2011-076, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Virginia Public School Register - Blacksburg School no. 14 was completed in September 2011.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Virginia Public School Register contains the names, ages, and attendance records of students attending Blacksburg White School No. 14. Entries date from October 1896 through March 1900.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Collection is arranged by material type.
